channel.title: Plex on Made By Nathan

item.title: Delete Plex TV Shows and Movies After Watching
item.description: Plex-Cleaner is a Python script that can clean up your Plex directory by deleting movies and TV shows after you’ve watched them. This will stop your disk from filling up with lots of old media files over time. You can run this script on your server (or Raspberry Pi, or wherever you run Plex Media Server.) I like to put things in the /opt directory on my servers. Run git clone https://github.
